• Green Party (Greens/EFA): 3.1–5.2%
  • Fine Gael (EPP): 21.8–26.3%
  • Aontú (*): 3.1–5.2%
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 1.4–2.9%
  • Fianna Fáil (RE): 18.0–22.2%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 3.1–5.2%
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 17.0–21.2%
  • Social Democrats (S&D): 3.9–6.2%
  • Independents (GUE/NGL): 1.9–3.6%
  • Independents (*): 2.8–4.8%
  • Independents 4 Change (GUE/NGL): 1.9–3.7%
  • Independent Ireland (RE): 2.7–4.7%
  • Independents (RE): 1.3–2.7%
